info.title: bunny.net Compute API
info.description: Edge Scripts and Compute API documentation for bunny.net. This API provides endpoints for managing edge scripts, releases, secrets, variables, and other compute-related resources.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the code for which the script that will be returned

200.description: The code of the script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the code for which the script that will be returned

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that will be deleted.

parameters.name: deleteLinkedPullZones
parameters.description: Deletes all pull zones linked to this edge script if true, otherwise changes origin to landing page

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

400.description: Failed deleting the script. See error response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that will be returned

200.description: The script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that will be updated

requestBody.description: The configuration that should be applied to the script

200.description: The script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the Edge Script for which the statistics will be returned

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: (Optional) The start date of the statistics. If no value is passed, the last 30 days will be returned

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: (Optional) The end date of the statistics. If no value is passed, the last 30 days will be returned

parameters.name: loadLatest
parameters.description: (Optional) Load most recent data as soon as it's available

parameters.name: hourly
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, the statistics data will be returned in hourly groupping.

200.description: Returns the statistics for the Edge Script with the given ID

404.description: The Edge Script with the requested ID does not exist

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by edge script type

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The search term that will be used to filter the results

parameters.name: includeLinkedPullzones
parameters.description: Include linked pullzones

parameters.name: integrationId
parameters.description: Filter by linked integration

200.description: The list of scripts on the account.

400.description: Failed adding the script. Model validation failed

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the edge script that should have deployment key rotated

204.description: The deployment key has been successfully rotated

404.description: The Edge Script with the requested ID does not exist

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that will be updated

requestBody.description: The variable that will be added

200.description: The script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that contains the Environment Variable

parameters.name: variableId
parameters.description: The ID of the Environment Variable that should be deleted

204.description: The environment variable was successfully deleted.

404.description: The environment variable or script with the requested ID does not exist.

400.description: Failed deleting the environment variable. See error response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that contains the variable

parameters.name: variableId
parameters.description: The ID of the Environment Variable that should be returned

200.description: The script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that contains the variable

parameters.name: variableId
parameters.description: The ID of the Environment Variable that will be updated

requestBody.description: The variable that will be added

200.description: The script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script which will have the variable upserted

requestBody.description: The variable that will be upserted

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that will have the secret added

requestBody.description: The secret that will be added

200.description: The script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script to list secrets

200.description: The list of secrets for the script.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that will have the secret upserted

requestBody.description: The secret that will be upserted

204.description: The secret with existing name was updated

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that contains the secret

parameters.name: secretId
parameters.description: The ID of the secret that should be deleted

404.description: The secret or script with the requested ID does not exist.

400.description: Failed deleting the secret. See error response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script that will have the secret updated

parameters.name: secretId
parameters.description: The ID of the secret that will be updated

requestBody.description: The secret that will be updated

200.description: The script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script for which active release would be returned

200.description: Currently active release of the script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist or no active releases.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the script for which published releases would be returned

200.description: Published releases of the script with the requested ID

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Publishes the current code as a release

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the script release that will be published

204.description: The code version was successfully published

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

400.description: The script has no active code.

parameters.description: Publishes the current code as a release

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the script release that will be published

204.description: The code version was successfully published

404.description: The script with the requested ID does not exist.

400.description: The script has no active code.
